## Problem / Motivation
Is your feature request related to a problem? Describe it clearly.
E.g. "I can't filter results by minimum score..."

## Proposed Solution
Describe the feature you'd like and how it should work.

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered any workarounds or alternative solutions?

## Additional Context
Screenshots, mockups, or any other context that would help.
